==German== {{cardinalbox|de|17|18|19|siebzehn|neunzehn|ord=achtzehnte}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|ahtozehan}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*ahtōutehun}}, equivalent to {{compound|de|acht|zehn}}. Compare {{cog|nl|achttien}}, {{cog|fy|achttjin}}, {{cog|en|eighteen}}, {{cog|da|atten}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈaxt͡seːn/|[ˈʔaxt͡seːn]}} * {{audio|de|De-achtzehn.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|cardinal numbers}} [[eighteen]] ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|acht}} * {{l|de|zehn}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
